title: br
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The br tag defines a line break.

usageExamples.title: Example 1
usageExamples.description: Insert a line break between two lines of text.
usageExamples.code:
This is line one
This is line two
usageExamples.layoutsCode:
/p
	This is line one
	/br
	This is line two
